subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon has not won since June 10, when his crew chief, Steve Letarte, used a cunning pit strategy to help Gordon win a rain-shortened race at Pocono.
snippet: Jeff Gordon has not won since June 10, when his crew chief, Steve Letarte, used a cunning pit strategy to help Gordon win a rain-shortened race at Pocono.
